name: Storefront Pro Sales Pop
author: pootlepress

sections.description:
Shows fully customizable sales pop showing real time purchases, build trust and boost sales!

Storefront Pro Sales Pop

  • Layouts available
    • Image left (Horizontal)
    • Image right (Horizontal)
    • Image top (Vertical)
    • Image bottom (Vertical)
  • Customizable background, title and text colors
  • Custom border width and color
  • Web fonts and Google fonts for title and text
  • Left, Right or center position for popup
  • Custom size
sections.installation:
Installing “Storefront Pro Sales Pop‚Äù can be done either by searching for “Storefront Pro Sales Pop” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org.
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the “Plugins > Add New > Upload” screen in your WordPress dashboard.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I customize the pop up?

Go to the customizer, click Sales Pop, here you will find all customizing settings üôÇ

I dont see the sales pop ever after clicking cross `x` ro close popup. Is it normal?

Yeah, Sales pop will be removed from all pages if user closes.

Can I show the sales pop on all the pages? It is showing up only on shop and product pages.

Yeah, In Customizer > Sales Pop, Choose Site wide in Show sales pop field. This will show sales pop everywhere, except cart and checkout pages üòâ
